ai.seitok.flow.env

Interface Messagable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel<U>, Invoker<U>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullChannel, TestChannel, TestInvoker

    public interface Messagable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sends a message to the Messagable object
      default void sendMessage(java.lang.String fmt, java.lang.Object... args)
      Sends a formatted message to the Messagable object.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the Messagable object
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send

      • sendMessage

        default void sendMessage(java.lang.String fmt,
                         java.lang.Object... args)
        Sends a formatted message to the Messagable object. This is the same as calling sendMessage(String.format(fmt, args)).
        Parameters:
        fmt - The format to use
        args - The arguments to format with
